automobile_urbanity_source: EPA (2010) Light-Duty Automotive Technology, Carbon Dioxide Emissions, and Fuel Economy Trends: 1975 Through 2010. Appendix A. http://www.epa.gov/otaq/fetrends.htm#report
automobile_city_speed_source: EPA (2006) Final Technical Support Document Fuel Economy Labeling of Motor Vehicle Revisions to Improve Calculation of Fuel Economy Estimates. http://www.epa.gov/fueleconomy/regulations.htm#test
automobile_highway_speed_source: EPA (2006) Final Technical Support Document Fuel Economy Labeling of Motor Vehicle Revisions to Improve Calculation of Fuel Economy Estimates. http://www.epa.gov/fueleconomy/regulations.htm#test
automobile_trip_distance_source: Calculated from data/trip_distances.csv - average of trip_distance weighted by sample_size
